identity.mission: Create a fitness e-commerce experience that feels like a high-end gym at nightâ€”intense, focused, and premium. Avoid generic 'health store' vibes.
principles: Contrast: Deep Darks vs. Kinetic Neons

rules: Headings MUST use 'Oswald'. Letter-spacing: 'tracking-tight' for large text.
Use uppercase for labels and small headers (tracking-widest).

primary.description: Kinetic Orange - Use for primary CTAs, Buy Buttons, Sale Tags

secondary.description: Cooling Blue - Use for trust signals, info badges, secondary actions

grid_system.marketing: The Tetris Grid (Grid Cols 12) - Use for Landing Page & Categories
grid_system.dashboard: The Control Room (Grid Cols 4) - Use for Admin Panel

buttons.primary: bg-orange-500 hover:bg-orange-600 text-white font-oswald uppercase tracking-wider
buttons.secondary: border border-zinc-700 hover:border-orange-500 hover:text-orange-500 bg-transparent text-white font-oswald uppercase

cards.classes: bg-zinc-900/40 backdrop-blur-md border border-white/10 hover:border-orange-500/50 transition-colors duration-300

inputs.style: Minimalist, bottom border only or flat background.

hero.alt: Intense female boxer in dark gym

assets.icons: Use 'lucide-react' for all UI icons. Use 'Dumbbell', 'Activity', 'ShoppingBag', 'User' icons.

universal_guidelines: DO NOT use gradients for text unless it's a very subtle shine.
DO NOT use rounded-xl or rounded-2xl. Keep it sharp (rounded-sm or rounded-none) for the 'tough' aesthetic.
Ensure all text has sufficient contrast against the dark background.
Images must have 'object-cover' to fill their containers.
instructions_to_main_agent: You are building a high-performance fitness e-commerce app. Focus on the 'Dark Mode' aesthetic defined in colors. Use the provided image URLs for the landing page. Implement the 'Tetris Grid' for the hero/featured section. Ensure the Admin Panel uses the 'Control Room' dense layout. Use Shadcn components but override the radius to 'rounded-sm' to match the brand.
